shipping.question: What are your shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer Standard (5-7 business days, $5.99), Express (2-3 business days, $12.99), and Overnight ($24.99) shipping. Free standard shipping on orders over $50.

shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
shipping.answer: Yes! We ship to over 100 countries. International shipping starts at $15.99 and typically takes 7-14 business days. Customs fees may apply.

shipping.question: How can I track my order?
shipping.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing order history.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days of receiving the return.

returns.question: How do I start a return?
returns.answer: Visit our Returns Center, enter your order number and email, select items to return, and print your prepaid return label. Drop off at any carrier location.

returns.question: Are there any items that cannot be returned?
returns.answer: Final sale items, personalized products, and opened beauty/health products cannot be returned for hygiene reasons.

account.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
account.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send you a reset link. The link expires in 24 hours.

account.question: How do I update my billing information?
account.answer: Log into your account, go to Settings > Payment Methods, and add/edit your payment information. All data is encrypted and PCI-compliant.

account.question: Can I change my email address?
account.answer: Yes, go to Account Settings > Profile and update your email. You'll receive a confirmation email at both old and new addresses.

pricing.question: Do you offer student discounts?
pricing.answer: Yes! Students get 15% off with a valid .edu email address. Verify your status through our Student Discount page.

pricing.question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
